des:
With the SEI Firebox Skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your SEI Firebox devices via voice.

To get started, please follow the setup guide at https://seialexafireboxsupport16home.files.wordpress.com/2019/09/fa4723-setup-guide-for-voice-control-20190701.pdf - a copy should also have been provided with your Firebox.

You will be asked to link both the Firebox device and the Alexa skill to your Amazon account, so please ensure you use the SAME Amazon account details for both steps.


Once you’ve completed setup of your device + Alexa Skill, you can use the following phrases to control your SEI Firebox via Alexa. Just replace {Fireplace} with whatever you named your device in step 4 of the setup guide:


Turn your Firebox on or off by saying:

"Alexa, turn on Fireplace" or "Alexa, turn off Fireplace"


Control your Firebox downlight with:

"Alexa, turn on Fireplace downlight" or "Alexa, turn off Fireplace downlight"


Adjust the Firebox log by saying:

"Alexa, turn on Fireplace log" or "Alexa, turn off Fireplace log"


Adjust the Firebox flame by saying:

"Alexa, turn on Fireplace flame" or "Alexa, turn off Fireplace flame"


Control the heat with:

"Alexa, turn on Fireplace heater" or "Alexa, turn off Fireplace heater"


Or set the heat by saying:

"Alexa set Fireplace heater to 70"



If you have any questions, please head over to https://seismartfireplace.com for further support.


Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).
